column6:
Introducing the X-Mutant Attack Division--X-MAD--a group of former mutants convinced that M-Day was a result of a government plan to destroy mutants! And when this terrorist organization launches an assault on the government and then takes refuge in Mutant Town, X-Factor finds itself caught in the middle.,2007,3
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Pablo Raimondi | colorist:Brian Reber
